message.content:
cs.IT, cs.DS, cs.CR, cs.CC, cs.SI. 

The paper deals with private information retrieval (PIR) in distributed storage systems, which involves information theory (cs.IT) and distributed systems (cs.DS). The paper also proposes an algorithm to optimize communication price of privacy (cPoP), which involves cryptography (cs.CR) and coding theory (cs.CC). Finally, the paper applies the proposed algorithm to several distributed storage codes, which involves system optimization (cs.SI).
